website_summaries.verdict: A gentle incline makes this lounger a great option for little ones battling with digestive issues. An excellent post-meal prop.
pros: Deep contours and a sling-style seat securely cradle tiny bodies
Upper body elevation combats digestive and respiratory discomfort
Sling seat and adjustment tabs provide a customized fit for growing babies
Machine washable cover makes cleaning a breeze
cons: Seems to retain heat, making some babies feel uncomfortably warm

customer_reviews.title: My favorite purchase so far for baby
customer_reviews.text: probably the most used product that I have purchased for this baby. My son was 3 weeks early and a tiny little peanut but I just tighten up the Velcro and place him backwards in this, his head where his feet are intended to go, and it supports him perfectly. He appears totally comfortable and secure. Also this seat is really easy to move from room to room with me as we keep my 3 year old entertained all day :)
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this product!! Only thing my infant would sleep in for his first 2.5 month! & I felt safer sleeping @ night because it kept his head slightly elevated for us so he never spat up after feedings. Our Yorkie even loved it!!!! 😉
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new baby!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must-have! I know the product says not to use for sleeping, but my son started sleeping in this early on and our pediatrician approved. We secure it safely in a bedside bassinet so it doesn’t move and there’s no fall or tumbling risk. It’s nice because it keeps him elevated slightly after eating and also cradles him. My son also had to have surgery and it was perfect for post-op because he needed to keep his head elevated to help with swelling. Family members bought us this as a gift and we’ve already gifted one to someone else. This definitely goes in our Top 5 must have items for a new baby!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna M

customer_reviews.title: Most used baby product we have!
customer_reviews.text: Goodness knows how many thousands of dollars we have spent on our little one since she was born. But this, this right here, is the best thing we have. She's now 13 months and still lounges in it every morning and afternoon which sipping her cup and relaxing after a nap or while we read a book. No flat head. Just enough lift to help with reflux. On the bed, couch, floor. Brought on trips. Easy to clean slip cover. Just absolutely excellent. I've now gifted this lounger to 3 new mom's and they all RAVE about it. Unlike everything else that they grow out of in the snap of a finger, THIS is the must-have item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Received this as a gift and since I had a Boppy I didn’t think I would use it, but boy was I wrong! I use this all day! It is such a perfect spot to safely place baby. It is supportive and baby doesn’t hunch over like they do in the boppy. The directions say not to take naps in it, but my baby takes supervised naps in it and cannot yet roll. Once baby is done with it my cat will happily keep it. The cover easily comes off. My only suggestion would be that they make a waterproof liner option like the boppy has to put between pillow and cover bc my baby is a puker!
customer_reviews.author: LSUNurse

customer_reviews.title: So cozy!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t really think we would get much use out of this; I put it on my registry on an impulse. I’m so glad I did because this is my daughter’s favorite place to hang out! She prefers this over her swing and her bouncer. It snuggles her securely and I love the green dot print. Our only problem with it is that our dog is jealous and keeps sneaking onto it when the baby isn’t using it! Luckily it spot cleans well because he drools...
customer_reviews.author: MR226

customer_reviews.title: My baby prefers the Boppy lounger
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is pretty similar to the Boppy lounger. The Podster has the baby lounging in more of an upright position, compared to the Boppy. One thing I don't like about the Podster is the fact that the sling seat is super thin, stretchy fabric without any cushion, which means you can't really set your baby in the Podster on top of a hard surface like a table. My 3 week old prefers the Boppy- not sure why, but he does. The Boppy is a little bit cheaper, so we ended up returning the Podster.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I got this pillow. My baby has reflux and I’m exclusively pumping. While I pump I’m stuck and it’s hard to tend to her which is super frustrating, but now I can jus put her next to me and I can at least comfort her and distract her with a toy when she fusses. Also the angle is nice for her reflux - less spit up after feeding. It’s also easy to clean with the removable cover. I also love the fact that it’s expandable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ReRe

customer_reviews.title: Best sleep yet for my newborn (and for me!).
customer_reviews.text: Used this thing for the first time last night with my 2.5-week old and it is the best sleep I’ve gotten since having him! He unfortunately refuses to sleep on flat mattresses (crib or bassinet) and would ONLY sleep in my arms, on my chest, or in his swing. None of those things are ideal (or very safe) when you are dealing with a nursing newborn and a VERY sleep deprived momma. Little guy had previously been waking up every 1-2 hours (I believe 3 hours was the longest stretch) to nurse or just to fuss. With this thing I actually got two 5-hour sleeps from him! *mind blown* Would highly recommend for new mommas who have fussy babies!
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had ordered one sooner!
customer_reviews.text: We lug this thing around everywhere and wish we had it since day one! I exclusively pump, so it’s been a lifesaver when it comes to pumping and having the baby around. He just chills out in his little nest next to me while I pump. He takes naps in it, sits in it so he can see what’s going on, it’s perfect for me to prop him in to read to him. We really do take it pretty much everywhere we go. I’m sad he’s starting to outgrow it!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny S

customer_reviews.title: My daughter didn't like it...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love it, except my baby hates it! Too bad because it seems nice otherwise. I wanted somewhere safer for her to sleep (other than with me me), but she barely last a minute when awake. If i put her in it sleeping and swaddled it's hit or miss. She may wake up immediately or stay sleep for an hour. But I'm not swaddling her much so it usually not being used. I could see her maybe liking it once she's bigger but who knows. She's three months now and I got it when she was almost two months. I think she sinks too much and isn't comfortable. But every baby is different. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Lachiny718Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: This is my second and LOVE it for newborn
customer_reviews.text: I discovered this with 2nd baby and wished I had found for first. Gave away to a friend with newborn soon after baby outgrew. Had to rebuy again for 3rd as love it so much! Only thing i’m a little hesitant on is it’s not organic, not sure how non toxic etc. it is but other than that I love it. Super easy to plop a newborn down propped up a little. Need to be careful if using around older (young) siblings as I stick baby on a table or high places sometimes in it and worries older brother will pull it off!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonQueen

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: I just had my third child and I’m wondering why I didn’t have this for my first 2! I love it and so does my baby. I like how it’s adjustable, easy to clean, and portable. I know the price is a little steep, but I definitely recommend this! Look out for the warehouse deals! I got mine for $20 off the original price.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for baby to hang out in
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has loved it since birth. She hangs out in there and will nap in it if we let her. I love that it cocoons her and I don’t have to worry about her rolling out of it. It’s also easy to spot clean and to get the cover off to clean in the washing machine. I was worried about the position of her head and neck while in the pillow, especially after she was just born. We kept having to adjust her when she fell too low in the pillow. But as long as we watched her it seemed to be ok.
customer_reviews.author: nvschwatka

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: I got it when DD was a month old, and she is now 4 months. She sleeps in it to help with reflux and right now congestion. She likes sitting in it in the mornings while I get ready, plays with a toy and watches tv. I keep this by my head at night and can lay my head on it next to her. Well, until she learned to swing her arms and bonk me in the face. But this was amazing for us both when she was tiny. I would even put it next to the sink on the counter while I did dishes. Get this, you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla D Graviet

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My baby used this, on the couch, from birth to when she started trying to roll over. I used it to keep her head up after feedings and sometimes, for quick naps. I still use it but, for safety reasons, it stays in her play pen ON the floor. She’s 4 months and is able to slide off of it on her own. Machine washable!!!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: THANK YOU! I love this podster
customer_reviews.text: My daughter practically lived in this thing for 2 months of her life. Yes I am aware of the ABCs of infant sleep, but my colic newborn SLEPT in this podster and demanded nothing but this podster, I spent sleepless nights supervising her sleep in it but I never felt ahe was unsafe in it whatsoever, she LOVED IT. This was a huge game changer for me, I even washed it a few times and it didnt lose ANY quality after the washes. This is worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST!  Worth the shot!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't say enough great things about this purchase. It has saved us so much. This insert pillow allows you to fold up and compress the baby (like a little taco) when rocking them down for a little nap. It gives the baby a sense and feeling like you are holding them one you put them down. You just need to have a pillow or blanket to hold your desired position. I have 3 friends who have now purchased this since I introduced them to the lounger and they are all obsessed. We all spent so much more money on other loungers and the newest ones on the market and this one by far is our favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Peter McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Podster was the best money we spent for a sleepless newborn
customer_reviews.text: Baby wouldn't sleep anywhere other than her swing or in your arms. She hated her crib, pack-n-play, bouncy chair, various co-sleepers, you name it. The Podster changed our lives. She was snugly, thrilled she wasn't flat on her back & happy. We were eventually able to use the podster to help transition her to being in her crib and then finally flat on her back. Not being dramatic - this purchased changed our exhausted lives.
customer_reviews.author: John Selick, IV

customer_reviews.title: Sleep at last, thank God almighty she sleeps at last
customer_reviews.text: We have tried five different sleepers for my infant daughter. She always wound up sleeping on my chest making it difficult for me to get rest. The first time I placed her in the lounger she napped for two and a half hours, even with her big sister running around screaming in the background. Although the packaging states the lounger is not intended for sleep, this is the only product that offers my little one prolonged shut eye. My husband gives it six stars despite only five being available.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyMama

customer_reviews.title: A definite MUST for any new parent!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best baby product on the market, in my opinion. I used it for my son and kept it to use as a posing pillow for newborn portraits. Every client that sees how comfy the baby is in this, immediately buys one! Not only that but, I love it so much that I buy one for every baby shower gift too! All babies love laying in this! They just look so comfy! It is super light weight and convenient to carry from room to room. My son used it daily until he was a year old. I highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Ray

customer_reviews.title: BEST baby item we have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST item we have ever purchased for our baby. He sleeps every night in it and has never once seemed uncomfortable. Easy set down if you’re alone and need to put the baby down. Very easy to clean the cover. Lightweight and easy to transport. He LOVES this pillow so much we decided to give one as a gift to a family member with a recent birth. They have reiterated everything I have said, they swear by it. BUY BUY BUY you won’t regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bolyard

customer_reviews.title: Works great for twins with reflux
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect little lounger for my babies. I have twins who weigh less than 5 lb and needed something to help prop them up while I give them bottles and a way to keep them elevated after feeds for their reflux. I was looking at ordering a table for two but it was way too expensive and cumbersome. The podster works just as well and is much more convenient and versatile. Right now I have them sitting in it backwards because they are so small.
customer_reviews.author: Dev

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Update: this pod has now been through 3 babies. I have passed it on to my friends and their babies love it just as much as mine did. I now buy this for baby showers as I feel every parent should own one. It’s so easy to grab and throw into the car when visiting others. My 8 week old loves this. She weighs almost 13 lbs and fits perfectly. Not sure how long she will last but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Woodfarmsllc30

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My baby will be 4weeks in 3 days and absolutely loves it. He likes being held and snuggled so this was perfect. Thought about getting dock a tot but way to expensive and not very snuggly for baby . I use it for his daytime naps and for him to hang out in around the house. Extremely soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.author: FitBella

customer_reviews.title: Alot of my pregnant friends who I've bought this for tell me this gift has been the best gift they have recieved out of all thei
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this item numerous times. This item is the number one item that most mothers use out of any item that alot of people buy. Alot of mothers at first dont think this item os so important until they find this item is the most item they find that they use out of every item their friends buy them. Alot of my pregnant friends who I've bought this for tell me this gift has been the best gift they have recieved out of all their friends gifts, and It makes me so happy to know i purchased such a functional gift for them that lasts a long time
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: This was hands down my favorite baby item!
customer_reviews.text: I dont know what I would do without this. Great for newborns and still using it at 5mos to foster an ab work out to make baby learn to sit! My baby slept in it until he started to learn to turn. (We knew he was safe because as a newborn he couldnt turn in thisnoroduct due to the hugging sifes of the pillow shape like a doc a tot. If it wasnt for this, we wouldnt have coslept for the 1st couple of months! What a precious time it was.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must have for babies!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this so much that I bought one as a gift for a baby shower. What swayed me on this one vs other competitors was that you can unzip the outer shell and machine wash it. Got the gray which was very gender neutral. My baby has used it since birth (with supervision) and he loves it. I use it when I'm folding laundry or just need him to hang out. Super soft too!
customer_reviews.author: jenerationmama

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this little cushion
customer_reviews.text: I actually really love this cute little lounger. I wasn’t sure what to expect or what this really was when I ordered it but I had read good things about it. I was so surprised. It’s very good quality and really cute. I got the green polka dots (for my son) because it was the cheapest color but surprisingly I really love the color, it’s very fresh and soothing feeling. I’m just really pleased. So many times I’ve gone out on a limb to take a chance on something only to be disappointed but this was the opposite, I was pleasantly surprised and my son LOVES it. 👍
customer_reviews.author: James Maby

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!
customer_reviews.text: This product is a life saver! My 4 month old daughter has reflux has been using it for about 2 months now and the first few weeks were pure bliss! Don’t get me wrong, she still sleeps great now but the addition of this was a complete game changer. I understand that this product isn’t intended for sleep but it works great for reflux babies that wiggle their way off of crib wedges
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Staser

customer_reviews.title: We use this every single day!
customer_reviews.text: We use this EVERY day! It's easy to move around the house, and our daughter loves it! It's nice to have her off the ground and in somehing that keeps her safe! We sometimes flip her on her tummy in it and let her do tummy time at an incline. The cover is easy to take off and wash and holds up to being in the washing machine! A friend recommended this product and I am glad she did! I would purchase this item again!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: cannot imagine newborn life without one
customer_reviews.text: recommended by an experienced mom. as soon as it arrived on my doorstep, my newborn baby has loved being in it throughout the day and night. I am going to be sad when he grows out of it. It hugs him so well and it helps me avoid spitting up (which he does often when he is laying flat in his bassinet). cannot imagine my new mom life without it. planning on bringing it with us when we travel to see family.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice alternative to a bouncy seat
customer_reviews.text: Baby wasn't feeling the bouncer and I needed a place I could set him down when I have things to do. He likes his play gym and the carrier but I wanted an option where he could sit up and see what's going on in the room. This works well and he seems more comfortable in it. He's only a few weeks old now, hopefully it will grow with him!
customer_reviews.author: BookLover

customer_reviews.title: Safe and comfortable, reduced spit ups, reflux baby
customer_reviews.text: We love it! We bought it for our 2 month old son with reflux and it helps him keep his milk down. We have less spit ups and he is finally starting to gain weight. I highly recommend this. We were using a boopy at first but there was no lower back support so we used pillows but it just wasn’t safe. This has been the safest and most comfortable way to keep him propped after feedings. He loves it and so do we.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Love but wish stitching held up better
customer_reviews.text: We love our podster but I’m a little disappointed there’s already a hole in the fabric. I know it’s just in the stitch line but I still expect it to hold up a little better. I believe it’s only been washed once. Can’t find any replacement covers either. We’ve got two, one for upstairs and downstairs because my son loved them and it’s easy to lay him down in.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn McCoy

customer_reviews.title: New favorite baby item
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Wish I had purchased it sooner. I was struggling to manage my time and attention with 2 under 2. This lets me put my newborn down without him crying to attend to my toddler. I was hesitant because of the price but it’s worth every penny. I chose this one over the Boppy because it was deeper. The extra elevation has also helped with his acid reflex after eating.
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: This pillow is amazing! It makes me daughter feel tight and secure
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is amazing! It makes me daughter feel tight and secure. It's great to have on the couch while we watch Sunday football together. I just received it today but I can see myself using this in our bed for cosleeping. It's super thick that we wouldn't roll onto it. Probably my most favorite baby purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Navarre

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves this
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old is colicky and had a lot of trouble sleeping anywhere but on my chest. I tried different bassinets, swings, the boppy with no success. She naps in this with ease!!! She smiled the first time I put her in it. I actually use it as a co-sleeper, although it’s not intended for that use and it has allowed me to rest. I’m also the director of a child care center and I got one for each infant room. The babies love it. They much prefer it to the boppy pillows.
customer_reviews.author: word

customer_reviews.title: I want to love it, but as others said, its ripped
customer_reviews.text: I opened it and went to wash it first thing,the cover was easy to remove,etc, but the stitching was ripped already. I took a chance because I love my snoogle, but without replacement covers being an option, I cant love this item. My baby isnt even here yet and it's already damaged...
customer_reviews.author: B. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: A pillow that gives me and my daughter some r&r
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow and I'm beyond greatful I came across it! My daughter who has reflux needs to sit up for half an hour and the doctor recommended her sleeping at an angle, this is one of the only items that she sleeps in for hours. It has a nice mesh material in the middle so air can still circulate and keep baby cool. Since my daughter always has to be swaddled to sleep this pillow is helpful because it makes then feel "secure" and not to free. She sleeps so soundly in this! The great part is that it can fit in a bassinet, we have it in our Halo. Would highly recommend this item to parents!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: favorite baby product!
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver with a newborn at home. She loved it for sitting, snoozing (only while supervised of course), and playing. She cried when placed on her back or belly for the first couple of weeks, and so it was nice to have a soft, cushioned and comfortable place for her to lounge. I buy this for all my new mom friends now.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Makes my life as a new parent easier!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a place to put my 5 week old infant after feeding that wouldn’t make him spit up— this is perfect because it has an incline and is supportive. So happy I purchased this— I now can place him on the pillow while I do chores around the house. It is easy to transport him in this so I can take him from room to room to keep an eye on him.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PILLOW!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure I've bought at least 20 of these! They are my go to baby shower present and everyone always loves them. I can't say enough nice things about this pillow. It's a must have baby accessory - you will not be disappointed! Also, it's not just for babies! My daughter is almost 3 and still uses hers as a bean bag when she's watching movies or laying around. Your baby's head will not get flat in this pillow, they can't roll out of it and they will sleep like a champ all cuddled in it. Best best best baby accessory!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PILLOW!! It's A Must Have
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this pillow to sleep through the night in her bassinet and for naps. I know babies are not suppose to sleep in the pillow but we use it and it works great. My 3 month old actually sleeps through the night and I am thankful she gets a goods night rest in her pillow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little pillow over two years I’ve used it for two babies and they loved it and gave me much needed hands free time! I would bring it with me to friends houses and my parents house when I knew there would be no where else to lay baby down so I would have been stuck holding the baby. Not to mention it is Super cute and I definitely want one I am adult size lol
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Harmon

customer_reviews.title: Essential baby product
customer_reviews.text: I love the incline on this lounger compared to the other one on the market. My baby happily sits in this a lot during the day. The only thing I do t like I’d the fabric in the seat of it. It stains SO easily and it would be nice if it were stain resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Erin P.

customer_reviews.title: A must have for every new parent
customer_reviews.text: This pillow should be required on every single Baby Registry! I didn’t get one until my baby was 3 months old and the first day we tried it he took a three hour nap. I can’t even imagine how much easier my life would have been if I’d had it when he was a newborn. Their little tushies snuggle down on the mesh so they can’t wriggle out of it and it holds them like they’re in mom or dad’s arms. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Still using them daily at 19 months
customer_reviews.text: Our twins used these in the newborn stage for naps (even though you're not supposed to) and feeding. We used them constantly. At about 6 months the twins seemed done with them and we put them away BUT I brought them back out on a whim when they were about 11 months old and now we are using them again daily. The girls are 19 months now. They use them to lie in when they are drinking their sippies. They wash great and are great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Lifehack G

customer_reviews.title: Baby and I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow for my daughter and she loves it, too. It makes her think she’s being held. I try to place her in her bassinet for naps, but she’ll wake up. With this, I can lay her in it and she stays asleep. Only thing is, make sure you supervise if your baby naps in it since back is best to prevent SIDS.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen K.

customer_reviews.title: Broken Zipper
customer_reviews.text: This is a convenient product, because it is easy to pick up and put down with one hand, while baby is in the other arm. It's comfortable for a newborn. But the zipper on the product I received was not well made. The zipper broke the first time I tried to remove and wash the cover. The zipper head came off the end of the zipper and it won't go back on, so there is no way to zip the cover closed again. Unfortunately this happened the day after the Amazon return window closed. I have contacted the company to request repair.
customer_reviews.author: H and J

customer_reviews.title: A mother’s and her newborn best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Me and my newborn can not live without this. This is a mother’s best friend. Now a mother just needs a “Back Buddy” for all those back pains. Why hasn’t Amazon filter this all over their baby ads, I wish I had known about this! I literally opened it the second it arrived and fell in love within seconds when my newborn was fussing but I needed to eat. Right after I put her on she stopped and now I’m spending my precious seconds to write a review in hope that other moms can be rescued too! Buy it and try it out.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Because once he had good head control
customer_reviews.text: This seat works very well for newborns and little baby. It does not work for older baby. My baby refused to sit in there after he is about 4 months. Because once he had good head control, the lying down angle is just not comfortable for him anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Just bought my second one
customer_reviews.text: I had this 4 years ago with my first child and just purchased a new one for my second child because we left the old one abroad. The major difference it has from similar Boppy lounger is that it has a removable cover. And you can even purchase an additional cover separately if you need to. And it doesn't have that unpleasant chemical smell that Boppy louger has.
customer_reviews.author: Maarussia

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lounger, this is a must have. It’s perfectly shaped for baby and easy to lay him in when there’s stuff that I need to get done. It’s easy to get from one place to another and altogether a great purchase. It’s my favorite baby item to have and I’m so glad I purchased it when I was on the fence about it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: BABIES LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Our babies are 9 months old now and still use their Podster EVERYDAY! They are within their play area so when tired from playing so hard they crawl onto the Podster and fall asleep. When they see us bring a bottle to them they crawl on Podster and reach for their bottle excitedly!! Their is just to many great things to say about The Podster! But it and try it! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Ah-mazing.
customer_reviews.text: Worlds greatest baby invention? Possibly. Wow I love this thing. A friend of mine got it for us bc it was a lifesaver for her, and we love it so much we actually bought a second one for downstairs! It cradles baby perfectly and can grow as baby grows. So much better than the boppy. It as a spandex sling at the bottom to cup baby's bum, so they feel much more cradled. Awesome awesome awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Francis

customer_reviews.title: 3 month review
customer_reviews.text: This product is WONDERFUL!!!! My baby would only nap in this lounger. Very good for babies with reflux. Easy to clean! My husband uses this as a pillow and it still soft and fluffy. My baby has used this for 3 months but now “froggy legs” out of it. It is deep enough that he isn’t able to fall out entirely just slides down. Will use for the next child!!
customer_reviews.author: Tavonne W-Carr

customer_reviews.title: #1 Essential Item for All Newborns!!
customer_reviews.text: Our friends GAVE us theirs, and we loved it so much and feel we would not have survived infant life without this amazing item!! So we bought one for our friends who had a baby a few months after us. Cannot say enough wonderful things about this lounger. Excellent price. When baby was younger, she lay in it all of the time, and I moved her from room to room in it. Now that she's older, I keep it in her pack-n-play for naps and it hugs her while she sleeps. The lounger has grown with her and she is almost 7 months now and finally growing out of it. It's the #1 baby item I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J & J

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby, Great for Mom!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing for babies who don't roll yet. I have bought one for myself (used for two babies).....and bought two as baby shower gifts. It is easily moved around the house as a safe place to set baby while multitasking (My personal favorite was setting them outside the tub allowing me to shower). Easy to travel with and a place to set baby at family and friends houses. My babies even used them when they were napping next to me. Comfortable for them and no hole to slip through, padded enough to prevent rolling. Both my boys outgrew it by 4 months. But it was a lifesaver for 4 months twice!
customer_reviews.author: Rakkiia

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves to snooze in this. I know it’s not approved for sleeping but I use it in my bed as a co-sleeper. My baby sleeps throughout the night in it. When she begins to roll I won’t be able to keep her in it but right now it works for us.
customer_reviews.author: Eagleschick76

customer_reviews.title: Ripping after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: My baby has only been in this product for 6 weeks and the fabric is ripping at the seams. For this price I would have expected higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: H.hendrix

customer_reviews.title: Baby only stays in there for five minutes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product but my baby doesn't like it as much. everytime I put her into the lounger She would cry after five minutes. The product is good but I guess its just babys personal preference. I wish she liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Delaneywu

customer_reviews.title: Very useful, helpful and comforting item
customer_reviews.text: It provides safety and support when the baby sits or sleeps. The baby loves it, I love it, my dog loves it. We will keep it even after the baby outgrows it. We still love it. My dog loves it. 4/25/20
customer_reviews.author: Rosemarie

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this, but my daughter doesn't like it at ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this, but my daughter doesn't like it at all. Every time I put her in it, she starts to make a choking sound. I do not think that the angle formed by the pillow and sling works for her. The pillow is incredibly soft (I wish I could use it as my own pillow) and I love that it is washable. It is nice that you can move it throughout the house and you can travel with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Great idea
customer_reviews.text: A purchased after a daycare parent of mine brought one day so I could give it to the grandma picking her baby up in the evening. Having never seen one before, I tried it out here that day and her baby slept better than he has ever slept. Elevated him just enough, cradles him but not too much. I bought one for him and future babies at this daycare and I’m sure it will be used by many.
customer_reviews.author: Mona M.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this lounger and so do we. Our baby has torticollis and this cradles and supports his head. It gives us somewhere safe to put him that isn’t a swing or bouncer that could create a flat spot.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!
customer_reviews.text: My baby enjoy so much. He is quite long for his age - (3 months old) he wasn’t fitting in his baby comfort anymore so I bought this one and to travel also since it’s light-weighted and you can put in your suitcase easily. I feed him and he sleeps in it. He feels so comfortable! I absolutely adore! I would buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: jessicafarinazzo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift for baby
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent baby shower gift - people love them. I have bought 2 for different people and it seems to be the most used gift and one that most haven't seen before
customer_reviews.author: amanda clark

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant at first because of some of the reviews but I'm so glad I decided to try it out. My son congestion and reflux issues and is not able to sit without support. This let's him lay somewhat upright but still allows an open airway. It's firm enough to give good support but still plush enough to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kjegmm

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for new parents.
customer_reviews.text: My infant absolutely love this podster. He is almost three months and has been using this since he was one month old. I was looking for something that would keep him upright for a little while after he eats to help him digest his food. We later found out that he absolutely love this thing to nap in and we also started using this to give his bottle in. This save us the trouble of trying to hold him in our arms to feed him. I thinks its safer and allows us to control him during feedings. A great baby shower gift!
customer_reviews.author: L Shi

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful!!! My baby wouldn't sleep anywhere but my arms, but she will sleep on this. She seems to absolutely love this. The material is soft and the product looks to be well made. This is definitely worth a shot if you baby is picky on where they sleep. I would by again in a heart beat. My baby is 10 lbs 6oz 22 inches and she fits perfectly in it with the staff closed. I haven't yet opened the strap to see how large it gets.
customer_reviews.author: veronica

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 1 month old baby already hates to be put down and when she falls asleep in our arms, she knows when we lay her down and will wake back up, but with this pillow, she can’t help but stay asleep or fall asleep in it. She’s so comfortable! This is a baby must have! She loved it the moment we got it and put her in it! She feels secure and we are happy parents! (I don’t write many reviews, but I had to for this product) very pleased with our purchase. Wish I ordered it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Beyond amazing baby must have
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough how amazing these are. My daughter loves to sit in hers and will often nap in it. When traveling I had my mom order a cheaper boppy lounger and it was terrible compared to this one - she looked awkward and was uncomfortable and wouldn't use it so we ordered another one of these. Perfect cushion around her so she can't roll out and I feel comfortable setting her down to go make a bottle, clean etc
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Becker

customer_reviews.title: Your baby needs this.
customer_reviews.text: Love this pillow. Great for baby to nap on and just hang out on with a little elevation. Got it when babe was 5 weeks and still using it daily 6 weeks later. No sign of stopping and when I do I'm pretty sure my dog is going to be claiming it for her new bed!
customer_reviews.author: Brit chick

customer_reviews.title: Handy and Heavy
customer_reviews.text: Have now purchased two for my grandchildren. It is heavy ( in a good way- can pick it up with one hand when empty ) and substantial, and can be used until they start to roll over and become mobile. Much more stable than the Boppy -- can park the baby on a couch or bed, ( while watching her ) - and it feels safer than an infant seat or other cushions. Cover washes easily and looks new. It has a solid feel- so even with dogs and other kids around- doesn't give the feeling a bounce on the couch would shake the baby.
customer_reviews.author: BlueRidgeView

customer_reviews.title: Newborn essential, but with a short shelf life
customer_reviews.text: The "pod", as we call it, was a staple in our house for the first month of my son's life. He napped in it all day from the time he came home from the hospital until he was about 5 weeks old. We put it on the coffee table in our den, and we could all watch him while he slept. It's also great to take to friends' houses, because it's light weight and very portable. When my son started spending more time awake, he no longer enjoyed the pod. I think it's because he can't really move in it and feels confined. It was well worth it, though, for the first month of his life.
customer_reviews.author: A. Gift For You

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I so wish I found this before all the other similar ones I bought for my twins. We only bought one but it's definitely the preferred one in our home.
customer_reviews.author: Erica H.

customer_reviews.title: This product is amazing! Our baby cries when we put him down ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! Our baby cries when we put him down but in the poster we can sometimes get away with it, such a lifesaver. It’s also great on our laps facing us to interact now that he’s too big for a boppy that direction. We can move him easily too. A must have, wish I had found this earlier! Also love the removable cover
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Roman

customer_reviews.title: Quality product & a must have for new parents!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a larger version of the boppy newborn lounger and stumbled upon this. It is larger and overall better than the newborn lounger because it grows with your baby using the velcro latch to extend the pillow size, and it is also has a machine washable cover. however it does put pressure on both sides of infants head so be careful of it causing flat spots. Aside from that one down side this is a must have for anyone with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Early days our son would fal asleep while holding easily but wake when laid or transferred
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for us and now about a half a dozen friends we have bought one for! Early days our son would fal asleep while holding easily but wake when laid or transferred. This was amazing the way it cradled and seemed to maybe mimic us holding. Anyway was a nice lounger as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Poli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a quick nap
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars, but the cover has torn at the seam and I’ve had to sew it back together. Otherwise, this is a perfect seat of our baby to lounge in and sit up in. When she outgrows it, I know our cat will happily take it as a bed.
customer_reviews.author: Newmom

customer_reviews.title: cozy
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a little pricy, but compared to some of the other baby pillows, it's cheap by comparison. We wish we would have bought this sooner, he absolutely loves it. Plus you can put them on it and slide them under an activity gym when they want to play but don't want to lay flat
customer_reviews.author: James S.

customer_reviews.title: She has a bad shoulder and we have a three month old who ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a life saver, especially when my mother in law has to watch our son. She has a bad shoulder and we have a three month old who refuses to sleep during the day and wants constant attention, so you can see how this is awesome. He is able to be propped up and comfy
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Best thing I've purchased for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I've purchased for my baby. He is 2 weeks now and has slept in this every day since coming home. He has reflux as well and this helps him sleep better as it reclines him instead of him being flat on his back in crib. It's like a giant snuggly cloud for a tiny infant. My parents have asked me if there are adult versions of this pillow lol. Would def recommend to everyone I know. In fact, I am purchasing another one for my niece who is set to be here in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is worth every penny we spent. This is where my son sleeps at home and at daycare. He can't lay flat because of his reflux and this pillow provides just the right amount of elevation. My son is now 7 months old/20 pounds and still fits nicely on the pillow (and he can't get off of it on his own). Highly recommended!!!
customer_reviews.author: aarism

customer_reviews.title: The perfect baby gift.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve bought 8 of these. That’s right 8. They are my go to baby gift. I have friends that save them to use for their second child! It should be on every registry.
customer_reviews.author: lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love this - so convenient!
customer_reviews.text: This Podster is a newborn baby must have! I saw it Recommended on a mom blog, so thought I'd try it out. I didn't realize we'd use it so much! It's easy to transfer room to room for a safe/comfy place for baby to lay/sleep in. My husband and I have said several times how glad we are to have this! Definitely Recommend this to all moms
customer_reviews.author: Sierra D

customer_reviews.title: Baby and mama love this!
customer_reviews.text: My baby girl LOVES lounging in her podster. She has acid reflux so this really helps with her spitting up issues. It's super comfy (wish there was one where mom could lounge too, LOL). She sits in her podster on the couch between my husband and I and it's like the 3 of us are watching tv together 😊
customer_reviews.author: cargru

customer_reviews.title: It is very comfy cozy and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new granddaughter that came to visit. She is about 12 to 14 pounds. She absolutely adores it and would hang out in it a lot without getting fussy. As it turns out she loves to sleep in it and I just got an e mail from my daughter that took it home with her and the message was " this thing is a miracle sleeper." This came with a photo of it in the babies co sleeper, with her asleep in it. It is very comfy cozy and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Blaine

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing I’ve ever bought! My newborn is 4 days old and I can put him in it while I do laundry etc. He is so content laying in it. I’m telling you, it’s worth every penny...don’t second guess the purchase like I ddI!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I wanted to replace my daughters boppy with something larger. This was not larger but much nicer! It’s larger in the sense that the middle goes in more so it does add more space. This is very nicely made
customer_reviews.author: Amber Gomez

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases for baby
customer_reviews.text: This has been hands down one of the best purchases I’ve made for my baby. She’s 3 weeks old now and I use it several times a day. She can sit in it, take naps in it, and I even feed her in it. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: The perfect size and incline
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! The only thing that our reflux baby slept in for the first 3 months!! Highly recommend if your newborn deals with reflux or confestion and it keeps them in place so I didn't worry about her rolling over face down (although she is a big baby. I'm not sure how a small baby would fit)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can’t live without
customer_reviews.text: I would not have survived the first weeks of my sons life without this. And even now that he’s a little older, we still love to use this lounger for him. It kept him slightly elevated which helped with his reflux, and is wonderful for when we wanted relax on the couch when he was super little! Now that he’s bigger, we use it when he has his bottles and he even helps hold the bottle!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Oates

customer_reviews.title: Bought as baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves this gift I got her and uses it all the time. She said this will now be her new go-to when she has to buy a baby shower gift.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey McCormack

customer_reviews.title: Waaaaay better than boppy
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaay better than boppy! Perfect and comfy for baby! Babies that love to be snuggled and carried and not be put down after falling asleep feels secure and snuggled when put onto this! I wish I had this with my prior babies!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: My baby wouldn’t stay in this at all
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty bulky and is one of those baby items you buy and really never use. I find it to be too high to leave a baby in for even a second. I stuck with my boppy. My baby also didn’t like it. I donated it to his daycare.
customer_reviews.author: Nicola M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have item for new moms!
customer_reviews.text: Must have item for new moms! I have used this everyday since we brought my daughter home from the hospital 3 months ago. I primarily use it to sit her in next to me on the couch while I get situated for our marathon feeding sessions. She is on the small side at 9.5 pounds but she hasn't come close to getting out of it yet. Removable cover comes in handy for leaky diapers.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Mom and baby are enjoying this one
customer_reviews.text: I got this for the newest member of my family and both my niece and her daughter, my great-niece enjoyed it! Mom was happy that baby enjoyed using it since she's a hair stylist and it also doubles as the perfect prop for all those spur of the moment photo sessions. My great-niece always looks content on it.
customer_reviews.author: Selena Hilton

customer_reviews.title: We use this every day
customer_reviews.text: We love this pod! It's well made and a good size. I like the material, and the cover comes off easily for wash. We didn't realize that the sage green had small white polka dots, but honestly don't mind them. We have used this pod on our couch, in our bed, and nested in our co sleeper next to our bed since the day it arrived. It keeps our baby comfortable, slightly upright, and safely contained.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Chapman

product_meta.title: Leachco Podster Sling-Style Infant Seat Lounger, Sage Pin Dot
product_meta.description:
Color:Sage Pin DotThe Podster is a sling style infant seat lounger that provides a warm and c ounce y caress for infants. The deeply contoured sides help keep baby in place while the unique sling center expands with infant's weight. The Podster's adjustment tabs provide versatile support, creating a c ounce ier and more secure seat for smaller infants or expanding for a more generously sized area for growing infants when the adjustment tabs are released. The tabs even allow the Podster to adjust for sit up support for developing infants. The sling style seat provides customized support as well, expanding based on baby's weight. The upper body elevation provided can help aid in digestion and breathing. The Podster features a removable and washable cover.Removable Cover Care -To clean your removable cover, remove the cover from inner lounger, machine wash warm, gentle cycle. Use non-chlorine bleach if needed. Tumble dry, lowest heat setting, remove promptly.Inner Lounger Care - For best results, spot clean with soapy cloth to remove soils. Do not machine wash inner lounger.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Podster is a sling-style infant seat lounger that provides a warm and cozy caress for infants. The deeply contoured sides help keep baby in place while the unique sling center expands with infant's weight. The Podster's adjustment tabs provide versatile support, creating a cozier and more secure seat for smaller infants or expanding for a more generously sized area for growing infants when the adjustment tabs are released. The tabs even allow the Podster to adjust for sit-up support for developing infants. The sling-style seat provides customized support as well, expanding based on baby's weight. The upper body elevation provided can help aid in digestion and breathing. The Podster features a removable and washable cover.
feature_bullets: Sling style seat provides customized support based on baby's weight
Adjustment tabs create a cozier and more secure surface for smaller infants
Deeply contoured sides help keep infants in place and provide a cozy caress
Adjusts to provide sit up support for growing infants.
Removable and washable cover, Patented. Do not machine wash inner lounger
